mainSequence.step: Caregiver Requests to Enable Step Counter feature for User
User Receives Message: "Step Counter feature is now available."
Software Sends Daily Step Data to Health Monitoring Service, which Acknowledges Receipt
Caregiver Requests Step Count Data from Alfred
Alfred Retrieves Step Data from Software
Software Requests User's Step Data from Health Monitoring Service
Health Monitoring Service Sends Step Data to Software
Alfred Shows Step Data to Caregiver
